ACH_Last_4__c.inlineHelpText: The last four digits of the bank account used for this transaction.
ACH_Last_4__c.label: ACH Last 4

Always_Use_Last_Day_Of_Month__c.inlineHelpText: Sets future monthly, custom monthly, or quarterly donation installments to the last day of the month, regardless of Next Donation Date. Installment period must be Monthly or Quarterly, or a custom installment period using months.
Always_Use_Last_Day_Of_Month__c.label: Always use last day of month

CardExpirationMonth__c.inlineHelpText: The expiration month of the card used for this Recurring Donation.
CardExpirationMonth__c.label: Card Expiration Month

CardExpirationYear__c.inlineHelpText: The expiration year of the card used for this Recurring Donation.
CardExpirationYear__c.label: Card Expiration Year

CardLast4__c.inlineHelpText: The last four digits of the card used for this Recurring Donation.
CardLast4__c.label: Card Last 4

ClosedReason__c.inlineHelpText: The reason this Recurring Donation has its current Status value.
ClosedReason__c.label: Status Reason

CommitmentId__c.inlineHelpText: External identifier for Salesforce.org payment service integration.
CommitmentId__c.label: Elevate Recurring Id

CurrentYearValue__c.inlineHelpText: This Recurring Donation's total amount for the current calendar or fiscal year (read only). Includes Closed Won Opportunities plus future installments for the rest of the year.
CurrentYearValue__c.label: Current Year Value

Day_of_Month__c.inlineHelpText: Sets the specific day of the month for future installment Opportunities when the Installment Period is Monthly. If you select 29 or 30, the installment date will be the last day of the month for months that don't have that many days.
Day_of_Month__c.label: Day of Month

DisableFirstInstallment__c.inlineHelpText: Prevents creation of the first installment Opportunity for a new Recurring Donation, regardless of the Installment Opportunity Auto-Creation setting in NPSP Settings.
DisableFirstInstallment__c.label: Disable First Installment

EndDate__c.inlineHelpText: After this date, NPSP no longer creates installments for this Recurring Donation and updates Status to Closed.
EndDate__c.label: End Date

InstallmentFrequency__c.inlineHelpText: The Installment Frequency along with Installment Period defines the installment schedule of this Recurring Donation. For example, if Installment Period is Monthly and Installment Frequency is 3, the schedule is defined as "every 3 months".
InstallmentFrequency__c.label: Installment Frequency

LastElevateEventPlayed__c.inlineHelpText: The last Elevate event played resulting in an update to this Recurring Donation.
LastElevateEventPlayed__c.label: Last Elevate Event Played

LastElevateVersionPlayed__c.inlineHelpText: An Integer that represents the last Elevate event version played resulting in an update to this Recurring Donation. Incremented automatically after each call to the Elevate API for changes. Used to prevent circular updates and to ensure the latest version is never overwritten.
LastElevateVersionPlayed__c.label: Last Elevate Version Played

NextYearValue__c.inlineHelpText: This Recurring Donation's total expected amount for the next calendar or fiscal year (read only).
NextYearValue__c.label: Next Year Value

PaymentMethod__c.inlineHelpText: The form of payment for this Recurring Donation. NPSP automatically copies the selected value to each related Payment record.
PaymentMethod__c.label: Payment Method

RecurringType__c.inlineHelpText: Select Open for an ongoing Recurring Donation. Select Fixed for a Recurring Donation that has a specific number of installments. For Fixed, you must also populate the Number of Planned Installments field.
RecurringType__c.label: Recurring Type

StartDate__c.inlineHelpText: The date that new or updated schedule information (Amount, Day of Month, etc.) for this Recurring Donation takes effect. The default is the current date.
StartDate__c.label: Effective Date

Status__c.inlineHelpText: Indicates if this Recurring Donation is actively in use, temporarily suspended, or closed.
Status__c.label: Status

npe03__Amount__c.inlineHelpText: The amount for each installment Opportunity.
npe03__Amount__c.label: Amount

npe03__Date_Established__c.inlineHelpText: The initial inception date for this recurring donation. The default is the current date.
npe03__Date_Established__c.label: Date Established

npe03__Installment_Period__c.inlineHelpText: The Installment Period along with Installment Frequency defines the installment schedule of this Recurring Donation. For example, if Installment Period is Monthly and Installment Frequency is 3, the schedule is defined as "every 3 months".
npe03__Installment_Period__c.label: Installment Period

npe03__Installments__c.inlineHelpText: Number of installments (donations) you expect to receive. For Fixed-Length Recurring Donations only.
npe03__Installments__c.label: Number of Planned Installments

npe03__Last_Payment_Date__c.inlineHelpText: NPSP calculates this value automatically based on the last time an installment Opportunity was marked paid (read only).
npe03__Last_Payment_Date__c.label: Last Donation Date

npe03__Next_Payment_Date__c.inlineHelpText: Calculated automatically using the active Recurring Schedule(s). Read only.
npe03__Next_Payment_Date__c.label: Next Donation Date

npe03__Open_Ended_Status__c.inlineHelpText: Choose Open for an Open-Ended Recurring Donation.  Choose None for a Fixed Length Recurring Donation.  Choose Closed to close a Recurring Donation.
npe03__Open_Ended_Status__c.label: DEPRECATED:Open Ended Status

npe03__Paid_Amount__c.inlineHelpText: The total amount paid on this Recurring Donation. Calculated automatically as the total amount of all Closed/Won installment Opportunities (read only).
npe03__Paid_Amount__c.label: Total Paid Amount

npe03__Schedule_Type__c.inlineHelpText: Tells Salesforce how to compute the amount for each child opportunity, based on what you've entered in the Amount field. For Fixed-Length Recurring Donations only.
npe03__Schedule_Type__c.label: DEPRECATED:Schedule Type

npe03__Total_Paid_Installments__c.inlineHelpText: Total number of installment Opportunities paid on this Recurring Donation (read only).
npe03__Total_Paid_Installments__c.label: Number Of Paid Installments

npe03__Total__c.inlineHelpText: For Non-Open Ended Recurring Donations, the total amount of all Opportunities.
npe03__Total__c.label: DEPRECATED:Total
